attributes.action: Shut all secondary schools down in England
attributes.additional_details: This break could be until the new approved Covid vaccine is out and ready for use. Schools should invest in remote learning for the benefit of their students.
attributes.background: Shut down all secondary schools in England due to increasing Covid-19 cases and children being in danger. School environments are not safe and practical for students at the moment, so that’s why they should have a break until everything gets back on track.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Close schools with confirmed COVID cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551681

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065
